channel.title: Machine Learning on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: OpenAI’s most capable AI model, GPT-5, may be coming in August
item.description: Sources say new model combines o3 reasoning with general GPT capabilities.

item.title: Two major AI coding tools wiped out user data after making cascading mistakes
item.description: “I have failed you completely and catastrophically,” wrote Gemini.

item.title: Cursor’s New Bugbot Is Designed to Save Vibe Coders From Themselves
item.description: One of the most popular platforms for AI-assisted programming says the next era of vibe coding is all about supercharging error detection.

item.title: Cursor’s New Bugbot Is Designed to Save Vibe Coders From Themselves
item.description: One of the most popular platforms for AI-assisted programming says the next era of vibe coding is all about supercharging error detection.

item.title: White House unveils sweeping plan to “win” global AI race through deregulation
item.description: Trump’s “AI Action Plan” reverses regulations, sparks critical pushback.

item.title: OpenAI and partners are building a massive AI data center in Texas
item.description: “Easy to throw around numbers, but this is a gigantic infrastructure project.”

item.title: OpenAI jumps gun on International Math Olympiad gold medal announcement
item.description: Non-math AI model reportedly solves proofs at human speeds, but early reveal roils community.

item.title: Exhausted man defeats AI model in world coding championship
item.description: “Humanity has prevailed (for now!),” writes winner after 10-hour coding marathon against OpenAI.

item.title: ChatGPT’s new AI agent can browse the web and create PowerPoint slideshows
item.description: New “agentic” AI feature combines web browsing with task-execution abilities.

item.title: This AI Warps Live Video in Real Time
item.description: A startup called Decart has developed an AI model that can transform live footage. The results are mind-bending—and poised to take over streaming.

item.title: This AI Warps Live Video in Real Time
item.description: A startup called Decart has developed an AI model that can transform live footage. The results are mind-bending—and poised to take over streaming.

item.title: Google hides secret message in name list of 3,295 AI researchers
item.description: Gemini 2.5 paper hides Easter egg in massive author list—but why so many contributors?

item.title: Why it takes 3,295 people to write one Google AI paper
item.description: Gemini 2.5 paper hides Easter egg in massive author list—but why so many contributors?

item.title: Former Top Google Researchers Have Made A New Kind of AI Agent
item.description: The mission? Teaching models to better understand how to build code will lead to superintelligent AI.

item.title: Former Top Google Researchers Have Made A New Kind of AI Agent
item.description: The mission? Teaching models to better understand how to build code will lead to superintelligent AI.

item.title: Another High-Profile OpenAI Researcher Departs for Meta
item.description: Jason Wei, who worked on OpenAI’s o3 and deep research models, will be joining Meta’s superintelligence lab. His colleague Hyung Won Chung is also joining Meta, a source tells WIRED.

item.title: Another High-Profile OpenAI Researcher Departs for Meta
item.description: Jason Wei, who worked on OpenAI’s o3 and deep research models, will be joining Meta’s superintelligence lab. His colleague Hyung Won Chung is also joining Meta, a source tells WIRED.

item.title: Chinese firms rush for Nvidia chips as US prepares to lift ban
item.description: H20 chips, designed to skirt export bans, are back after Trump meets with CEO.

item.title: New Grok AI model surprises experts by checking Elon Musk’s views before answering
item.description: Grok 4’s “reasoning” shows cases where the chatbot consults Musk posts to answer divisive questions.

item.title: AI 'Nudify' Websites Are Raking in Millions of Dollars
item.description: Millions of people are accessing harmful AI “nudify” websites. New analysis says the sites are making millions and rely on tech from US companies.

item.title: AI 'Nudify' Websites Are Raking in Millions of Dollars
item.description: Millions of people are accessing harmful AI “nudify” websites. New analysis says the sites are making millions and rely on tech from US companies.

item.title: AI therapy bots fuel delusions and give dangerous advice, Stanford study finds
item.description: Popular chatbots serve as poor replacements for human therapists, but study authors call for nuance.

item.title: AI Technology Breakthrough: New Algorithm Boosts Machine Learning Efficiency by 50%
item.description: Latest research shows new deep learning algorithms can significantly improve ML model training efficiency
